metadata.title: CVE-2021-33502 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The normalize-url package before 4.5.1, 5.x before 5.3.1, and 6.x before6.0.1 for Node.js has a ReDoS (regular expression denial of service) issuebecause it has exponential performance for data: URLs.

criterions.comment: node-got: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
